name: Real Crime Simulator
description:
This a unique game brings you to the streets full citizens, cops, gangsters and boss of mafia. Become a chief on the streets of criminality in Grand City! Unlock all the weapons and find secrets hidden on the map.

In game you are going for driving cars and bikes, carry out missions on the helicopter, escaping from police chase, be a killer and real gangster, making war with criminal factions, shooting different guns.

Game Features:
It's Free!
A Story tale and a lot of interesting criminal missions.
This excitingand dynamic action game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
New amazing open world.
Exciting car thief simulator.
Third person gameplay.
Rich 3D graphics.
New map of the Vice Town.
Different weapons and auto vehicles.
Destroyable cars and much more.
